message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product, and I believe it holds a lot of value for you.  I'm starting with a price of $15000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $14000.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit to $14500.  This reflects the value I've placed on the product and hopefully leaves some room for us both to be happy with the deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $14000.
